extendedInfo.description: Get ready for a playful and immersive 3D social gaming network righton your smartphone.Download the new Gameloft LIVE! application and stay connected toa large community of over 7 million players.And look forward to more features in upcoming updates soon.Key Features:â¢ Add and meet friends and stay always in touch. Invite them togames, send messages & chat in real time.â¢ A rich 3D version never-seen-before on smartphones! Customcreate your avatar and your environment inspired by some of themost famous Gameloft games.â¢ Build you gamer score, get rewards and trophies to unlockcustomization items with virtual Gameloft cash.â¢ Stay up to date! Access exclusive news, spotlight promotions andget the games at special discounts, only for Gameloft LIVE!Members.â¢ Your favorite titles at your fingertips! View and launch your gamesfrom one easy-to-navigate hub.Log in. Meet up. Play.--------Visit our homepage at www.gameloft.com.Follow us on Twitter at http://twitter.com/gameloft or like us on Facebook at http://facebook.com/gameloft to get more info about all our upcoming titles.Check out our videos and game trailers on www.youtube.com/gameloft. Discover our blog at http://blog.gameloft.com/ for the inside scoop on everything Gameloft.Certain apps allow you to purchase virtual items within the app and may contain third party advertisements that may redirect you to a third party site.Terms of use : http://www.gameloft.com/conditions/

reviews.title: Far From Great/Perfect
reviews.comment: Does not sync all of the games and most of the trophies from games (eg. says 0/30 (asphalt 6) when I have gotten at least 5 trophies) Bugs where doesn\'t load messages all the time. Needs alot of work, expected more with the size of the total download! I m sure the avatar part can be removed and focused more on the game sync and social part
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: World\'s great on my SG Note II
reviews.comment: Seems cool but not sure how long I\'ll actually use it. May be more interesting once I meet some people.
reviews.author: Paul Guzman

reviews.title: WOW!!!
reviews.comment: I play a lot of gameloft games on my samsung galaxy precedent phone, but have no friends. I ran across this app, and got excited because it clearly says that it is compatible with my device, yet when i go to use it after it has been installed, it says that it is not compatible with my device! So....what now gameloft? Fix your app, and i will fix my rating
reviews.author: Nathaniel Ward

reviews.title: Good Concept but Far from Great
reviews.comment: I can see where Gameloft was headed with this app but it has one huge problem - it doesn\'t sync properly. I\'m guessing Live was meant to be a Microsoft avatar/Sony Trophy achievement display app which you then can socialize with friends. But if the Live doesn\'t sync at all with the other Gameloft games how it is supposed to do what it was designed for? Fix the bugs so it can run like it was meant to. I\'m sure I\'m not the only person with this problem.
reviews.author: William Mix

reviews.title: No problems
reviews.comment: Not quite sure what the previous comments are referring to. I\'ve had this installed for over a week, using/checking it frequently and have had no problems at all. Runs smooth, links work, updates/refreshes quickly. Could use more free items though. Not everyone will spend money for a shirt for an avatar. Worth downloading for gameloft players.
reviews.author: Daniel Hunsdon

reviews.title: NOT COMPATIBLE??!!
reviews.comment: After downloading and all for some hours it will finally say its not compatible with my device??  A - - - 0 rate for this app if there is an option for negative rates
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Xperia play
reviews.comment: Good, however you should link game updates.. As I purchased my gameloft games through your website (buy 1 get 1 free) but I cannot update my games as the play market dosnt recognise ive purchased them. So cant get the bug fixes...  Just somthing to look into, other than that the app does what its supposed to
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: AWESOME
reviews.comment: Its a good app! Its easy to find more games than searching in the app store but nice app here! I suggest everyone to download this! Its awesome
reviews.author: Brian Flores

reviews.title: Not compatable...
reviews.comment: Just downloaded and it says my device is not compatable.. soo no friends to play with ill just delete all the gameloft games. Bye
reviews.author: Brody Johnson

reviews.title: Very usefull but
reviews.comment: Can\'t purchase any gameloft or any other games at India with my bank of India global debit card. I don\'t like pirated copies  plz help me I don\'t have credit card.  Any help will be appreciated.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love my avatar
reviews.comment: I love the whole app especially my avatar..she kind of reminds me of me.im givng it 3 stars now  bc i was able to play it when i had a samsung galaxy s but now that i have a samsung galaxy s3 it says its not compatiable. Oh well nice while it lasted
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Can\'t read messages
reviews.comment: It will not let me view my messages or requests.. there are notifications that I have some but when I click on my mailbox it tells me that I have no messages. Very annoying as I would like to accept my requests
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I rate this poor bc it doesn\'t sync games, & I don\'t receive anything when customer service sends me things like refunds or things for the game bc of Gameloft live not syncing everything correctly... Also, I have a Gameloft live account through the games, but when I installed the actual app to my phone & tried opening it, it said it wasn\'t compatible with my phone to get a refund!? Like really?! That\'s crazy & funny at the same time, but it\'s mainly just sad... Smh.
reviews.author: Stephanie Irizarry- Mohammed

reviews.title: Im very mad!
reviews.comment: I opened the app and it had to download other stuff and it was almost done then it froze my tablet
reviews.author: stacy johnston

reviews.title: Pretty cool
reviews.comment: But would be a whole lot more awesome, if it was compatible with my Nexus 7!!! From reviews I have read, does not seem to be compatible with tablets!! PLEASE MAKE COMPATIBLE!!!!
reviews.author: Joseph D\'Alessandro

reviews.title: bugs
reviews.comment: i have about 50 trophies in nova 3 and it shows only 1  same with asphalt 7  it has login issues also i get server error lot\'s of time
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: What the f**k?!
reviews.comment: What is wrong with you people, I can\'t even register!!!  I tried but nothing worked!!!  I hope you are happy Gameloft because you just lost a costumer!!!!
reviews.author: Corey Kent

reviews.title: Not very interesting
reviews.comment: I don\'t really get the point of this app. I suppose it\'s like the mobile analog to Xbox Live dashboard, but I haven\'t found anything it does better than the in-game GLL. And achievements don\'t seem to sync properly.
reviews.author: Yukai Li

reviews.title: Stupid
reviews.comment: I DELETED ALL MY SD CARD DATA WHICH IS 8MB AND IT SAYS I NEED 4MB I DO I HAVE.MORE THAN THAT -100 STARS -.-
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very Cool
reviews.comment: I think this app has great potential! However, I am not a fan of having to purchase clothing for my avatar with real money (maybe 50 cents for a hat, and a dollar for a complete outfit wouldn\'t be so bad). I think the avatars need more poses and backgrounds, for their snapsnot. I would like to see deeper interaction with other players, like a HUB where you can walk around and interact with other people (chatting, sitting, dancing, etc). That would definitely make come back more often.  As it is now, I really just use it to update my Gameloft profile pic. :/
reviews.author: Matthew De Los Santos
